snippet.title: Forza Horizon 5 Official Gameplay Demo - Xbox & Bethesda Games Showcase 2021
snippet.description:
Forza Horizon 5 is available on November 9. Play it day one with Xbox Game Pass.
https://www.xbox.com/games/forza-horizon-5 

Mike Brown, creative director of Forza Horizon 5 debuts an extended first look at gameplay. Join Mike and a few friends as they showcase a taste of what Forza Horizon 5 has to offer. Beautiful, diverse landscapes are on display as our players dip into a game of Piñata Pop through Horizon Arcade. Be sure to stick around until the end to check out a few possibilities of EventLab including custom races, challenges, stunts, and entirely new game modes.

Your ultimate Horizon adventure awaits! Explore the vibrant and ever-evolving open world landscapes of Mexico with limitless, fun driving action in hundreds of the world’s greatest cars.

Available on Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, Xbox Cloud Gaming, and PC on Windows 10 and Steam.

Subscribe to Xbox 🎮 https://xbx.lv/2EEjmaR

Follow Xbox on other channels:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Xbox
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/Xbox
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/Xbox

AUDIO DESCRIPTION: https://youtu.be/wzWK7PBor4s
